import { BsDash, BsPlus } from "react-icons/bs" import currencyFormatter from "currency-formatter"; import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" const Cart = () => { const { products } = useSelector(state => state.CartReducer); return (

Your Cart

Picture
Name
Price
Inc/Dec
Total
Remove
{products.map(product => (
{product.name}
{currencyFormatter.format(product.discount , {code: 'USD'})}
{product.quantity}
))}
Summary
: "your cart is empty"}
) } export default Cart
